alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 23 at 2:23AM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the Hermosa Foot Hills, the Rapid City area and the Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
